Drawer 抽屉

基本用法

展开查看
vue
<template>
  <a-space>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="visible = true">Open 基础使用</a-button>
    <a-button type="default" @click="importMoadlVisible = true">Open 导入组件使用</a-button>
  </a-space>

  <ur-modal v-model:visible="visible" title="修改密码" ok-text="保存" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleClose">
    <a-form :model="formData" layout="vertical">
      <a-form-item label="原密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.oldPassword" type="password" autocomplete="new-password" placeholder="请输入原密码" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="新密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.newPassword" type="password" placeholder="请输入新密码" autocomplete="new-password" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="确认新密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.passwordConfirmation" type="password" autocomplete="new-password" placeholder="请再次输入新密码" />
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
  </ur-modal>

  <base-modal v-model:visible="importMoadlVisible" @finish="refreshData" />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { message } from 'ant-design-vue';
import { ref } from 'vue';
import BaseModal from './BaseModal.vue';

interface FormState {
  oldPassword: string;
  newPassword: string;
  passwordConfirmation: string;
}

const formData = ref<FormState>({
  oldPassword: '',
  newPassword: '',
  passwordConfirmation: '',
});

const visible = ref<boolean>(false);
const handleOk = () => {
  message.success('OK');
  visible.value = false;
};
const handleClose = () => {
  message.success('取消');
};

const importMoadlVisible = ref<boolean>(false);
const refreshData = () => {
  message.success('刷新数据');
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped></style>
<template>
  <a-space>
    <a-button type="primary" @click="visible = true">Open 基础使用</a-button>
    <a-button type="default" @click="importMoadlVisible = true">Open 导入组件使用</a-button>
  </a-space>

  <ur-modal v-model:visible="visible" title="修改密码" ok-text="保存" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleClose">
    <a-form :model="formData" layout="vertical">
      <a-form-item label="原密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.oldPassword" type="password" autocomplete="new-password" placeholder="请输入原密码" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="新密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.newPassword" type="password" placeholder="请输入新密码" autocomplete="new-password" />
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="确认新密码" required>
        <a-input v-model:value="formData.passwordConfirmation" type="password" autocomplete="new-password" placeholder="请再次输入新密码" />
      </a-form-item>
    </a-form>
  </ur-modal>

  <base-modal v-model:visible="importMoadlVisible" @finish="refreshData" />
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import { message } from 'ant-design-vue';
import { ref } from 'vue';
import BaseModal from './BaseModal.vue';

interface FormState {
  oldPassword: string;
  newPassword: string;
  passwordConfirmation: string;
}

const formData = ref<FormState>({
  oldPassword: '',
  newPassword: '',
  passwordConfirmation: '',
});

const visible = ref<boolean>(false);
const handleOk = () => {
  message.success('OK');
  visible.value = false;
};
const handleClose = () => {
  message.success('取消');
};

const importMoadlVisible = ref<boolean>(false);
const refreshData = () => {
  message.success('刷新数据');
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped></style>
展开查看 BaseModal组件源码
vue
<template>
  <ur-modal v-model:visible="innerVisible" :confirm-loading="confirmLoading" title="组件模板" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleCancel">
    <ur-form v-loading="confirmLoading">
      <a-form-item label="模板下载">
        <a-button type="link" @click="onDownloadFile">点击下载</a-button>
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="导入文件">
        <ur-file-upload v-model:fileCode="formData.file_code" v-model:fileName="formData.file_name" btn-name="选择xls/xlsx/ 文件" />
      </a-form-item>
    </ur-form>
  </ur-modal>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed, reactive, ref } from 'vue';
import { message } from 'ant-design-vue';

const props = defineProps({
  visible: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
});
const emit = defineEmits(['update:visible', 'finish']);
const innerVisible = computed({
  get: () => props.visible,
  set: (val) => emit('update:visible', val),
});

const formData = reactive({
  file_name: null,
  file_code: null,
});

const handleCancel = () => {
  innerVisible.value = false;
};

const confirmLoading = ref(false);
const handleOk = () => {
  confirmLoading.value = true;
  setTimeout(() => {
    message.success('导入成功');
    confirmLoading.value = false;
    innerVisible.value = false;
  }, 2000);
};

const onDownloadFile = async () => {
  message.success('下载');
};
</script>
<template>
  <ur-modal v-model:visible="innerVisible" :confirm-loading="confirmLoading" title="组件模板" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleCancel">
    <ur-form v-loading="confirmLoading">
      <a-form-item label="模板下载">
        <a-button type="link" @click="onDownloadFile">点击下载</a-button>
      </a-form-item>
      <a-form-item label="导入文件">
        <ur-file-upload v-model:fileCode="formData.file_code" v-model:fileName="formData.file_name" btn-name="选择xls/xlsx/ 文件" />
      </a-form-item>
    </ur-form>
  </ur-modal>
</template>
<script setup lang="ts">
import { computed, reactive, ref } from 'vue';
import { message } from 'ant-design-vue';

const props = defineProps({
  visible: {
    type: Boolean,
    default: false,
  },
});
const emit = defineEmits(['update:visible', 'finish']);
const innerVisible = computed({
  get: () => props.visible,
  set: (val) => emit('update:visible', val),
});

const formData = reactive({
  file_name: null,
  file_code: null,
});

const handleCancel = () => {
  innerVisible.value = false;
};

const confirmLoading = ref(false);
const handleOk = () => {
  confirmLoading.value = true;
  setTimeout(() => {
    message.success('导入成功');
    confirmLoading.value = false;
    innerVisible.value = false;
  }, 2000);
};

const onDownloadFile = async () => {
  message.success('下载');
};
</script>

API

UrModal

属性说明类型可选值默认值
visible（v-model）是否显示booleanfalse | truefalse
confirmLoading提交按钮LoadingPromise<unknown> | boolean | undefined-undefined
confirmingMaskClosable确认时允许点击蒙层关闭modalbooleanfalse | truefalse

更多属性请参考antd Modal 对话框。
